response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality, innovation, and exclusivity. We believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or business, offering unparalleled benefits and opportunities. Considering its immense value, we are extending an exclusive offer to you at this price. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
